file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition.
  version: 1.0

paths:
  /pet/findByStatus:
    get:
      summary: Finds pets by Status
      operationId: getPetsByStatus
      tags:
        - pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    someSchema:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        type:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
